channel.title: Save to OneNote | Drafts Action Directory
channel.description:
Posted by agiletortoise, Last update 20 minutes ago

Save to timestamped note in the “Drafts” section of your default OneNote notebook. See our OneNote Integration Guide for more information on using OneNote with Drafts.

This is a companion discussion topic for the original entry at https://actions.getdrafts.com/a/1VP
